## PacksModule.open() method

Open Pack

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
open(packId: string): Promise<TransactionResultWithId<NFTMetadata>[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  packId | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;TransactionResultWithId&lt;NFTMetadata&gt;\[\]&gt;

## Remarks

Open a pack to burn it and obtain the reward asset inside.

## Example


```javascript
// The pack ID of the asset you want to buy
const packId = "0";
const rewards = await module.open(packId);
console.log(rewards);
```
